quest.name: Hearts as One
journal:
 Quest Sync
Phyna and Ciuna are prepared to fulfill their duty.

The bond between Phyna and Ciuna has been mended, and now they are prepared to carry out their duty to the village. They ask you to meet with them at the Morning Stars to once more serve as witness to their petition to the heavens.

With hearts as one they pray to the heavens, and no sooner do they finish their incantation than a spirit appears, kissed by thunder. As their witness, it falls to you to slay the spirit and deliver their prayers to the gods.
Your battle is quick like a flash of lightning, and with your final blow you bring the ceremony to a most satisfying conclusion. All the while Phyna and Ciuna are beaming with delight.

The twins are overjoyed to see the ceremony was a success, a testament to their commitment to both the village and each other. While they would love nothing more than to share the good news with Lanille, they extend that honor to you while they tend to cleaning the altar.

The ritual is complete, once more ensuring the protection of the gods. The experience has brought Phyna and Ciuna closer together than ever before, but there will yet come a day when they must part ways. It will not be a day for mourning, however, for though their paths will be separate, they will one day lead to a brighter future for Fanow.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: The ritual is certain to work this time. I know it!

dialogue.name: LANILLE
dialogue.text: I know not how they did it, but I am glad to see them of one heart and mind.

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: It is time, Forename. Phyna and I will make ready for the ritual. Meet with us at the Morning Stars when you are ready.

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: When you are ready.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: Let us begin.

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: O spirits of the wood, hear us! We seek to renew our vow to the gods of the Greatwood!

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: For the strength to protect these lands, to be the shield that guards against the accursed Light. We demand trial by combat to prove our worth.

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: To Ox'Charl, keeper of the winds. To Ox'Gatorl, keeper of flames. To Yx'Lokwa, bringer of rain. To Yx'Anpa, bringer of the harvest. We beseech you, spirits of the wood─hear our prayers and deliver them!

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: A spirit of lightning!

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: A spirit born of wind and rain, whose spark brings fire... And from the ashes may come a rich harvest.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: Our prayers will reach, Sister. There can be no doubt.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: As witness to our petition, we task you now with slaying the spirit. Go forth and see our prayers delivered to the heavens.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: Ox'Charl, let herhim be as swift as the wind...

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: Ox'Gatorl, give herhim the strength of the fiercest flames...

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: It is done!

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: The spirit is slain! You did it!

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: I confess I had my doubts at first, but you performed your duty admirably.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: Would you go and relay the good news to Master Lanille? We will be along shortly.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: We will be along as soon as we clear away the offerings.

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: Pray go ahead without us. We will not be long.

dialogue.name: LANILLE
dialogue.text: Phyna. Ciuna. I take it you were successful this time.

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: Yes, Master Lanille. Everything is as it should be.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: Though we see the world through different eyes, it does not change how we feel about the Greatwood.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: In matters concerning Fanow, we are of one heart and one mind.

dialogue.name: LANILLE
dialogue.text: And it is by the strength of your kinship that the Viis shall be blessed for years to come.

dialogue.name: LANILLE
dialogue.text: As you know all too well, the fulfillment of our duty to the allies of Ronka has necessitated change, and no few of our number feel uncertain of the future. But I believe we have found the answer to our woes, the means by which we may see Fanow thrive once more.

dialogue.name: LANILLE
dialogue.text: For centuries we have trusted none save our own and that will prove our downfall, for none can survive in this world alone. Not even the guardians of Yx'Maja.

dialogue.name: LANILLE
dialogue.text: There is much to be gained from opening our doors to the outside world, and your presence in Fanow has proven that.

dialogue.name: LANILLE
dialogue.text: On behalf of all the Viis, you have our humblest thanks.

dialogue.name: LANILLE
dialogue.text: As for you two, I expect great things of you in the future.

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: Thank you, Master Lanille. We will not disappoint you.

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: Phyna has decided to venture out into the world to find more of our fellow Viis who might be willing to return home.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: And Ciuna has pledged to protect Fanow, and help make our village a place where they will feel welcome.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: Two paths to the same goal.

dialogue.name: CIUNA
dialogue.text: Still, I will miss you dearly when you are gone.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: But I have yet to even decide where I will go, Sister.

dialogue.name: PHYNA
dialogue.text: There is still time for us to be together.
